creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: off-white; long shirt-like garment; slightly A-line; long sleeves with long tail hanging from each sleeve; orange embroidery around neckline (with stand-up collar) and cuffs in dense, finely-embroidered geometric patterns; tassel on long braided tail at neck; tassels at ends of tails on sleeves
marks:
Inscription and Label

at PL hem, in black ink:
title: Man's (?) dancing dress
